      • getTriggerSetForEvent

        protected Set<AbstractCustomTriggerManager.CustomTrigger> getTriggerSetForEvent(Class<?> event)
        Try to get set of Triggers associated with the event. It creates and puts new empty Set if couldn't find existing one already, and register it so can handle the event.
        Parameters:
        event - any event that extends Event (and HandlerList of course)
        Returns:
        Set of CustomTriggers associated with the event

      • registerEvent

        protected abstract void registerEvent(TriggerReactor plugin,
                                      Class<?> clazz)

      • createCustomTrigger

        public boolean createCustomTrigger(String eventName,
                                   String name,
                                   String script)
                            throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                   AbstractTriggerManager.TriggerInitFailedException
        Create a new CustomTrigger.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the class name of the Event that this Custom Trigger will handle.
        name - name of trigger (unique)
        script - the script
        Returns:
        true if created; false if trigger with the 'name' already exists.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - throws if className is not in abbreviation list, not a valid class name, or the specified event is not a valid event to handle.
        ParserException
        LexerException
        IOException
        AbstractTriggerManager.TriggerInitFailedException

      • getTriggerForName

        public AbstractCustomTriggerManager.CustomTrigger getTriggerForName(String name)
        Find and return Custom Trigger with the 'name'
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        null if no such trigger with that name; CustomTrigger if found

      • getTriggersForEvent

        public Set<AbstractCustomTriggerManager.CustomTrigger> getTriggersForEvent(String eventName)
                                                                    throws ClassNotFoundException
        get set of triggers associated with 'className' Event
        Parameters:
        eventName - the abbreviation, simple event name, or full event name. See getEventFromName(String)
        Returns:
        set of triggers; null if nothing is registered with the 'className'
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - See getEventFromName(String)

      • removeTriggerForName

        public boolean removeTriggerForName(String name)
        Delete the Custom Trigger with 'name'
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        false if no such trigger exists with 'name'; true if deleted
